/usr/bin/c++   -std=c++11 -pthread -fPIC -pedantic -g -Wno-missing-field-initializers -Wno-switch -Wno-multichar -Wsequence-point -Wformat-security -mstrict-align -ftree-vectorize -std=c++11 -std=c++11  -rdynamic CMakeFiles/rs-save-to-disk.dir/rs-save-to-disk.cpp.o  -o rs-save-to-disk -Wl,-rpath,/home/nvidia/cuda/librealsense: ../../librealsense2.so.2.10.0 -lGL -lGLU -lm -lglfw -lusb-1.0
